name: NSPersistentDocument
desc: A document object that can integrate with Core Data.

items.name: var managedObjectContext: NSManagedObjectContext?
items.desc: The managed object context for the document.

items.name: var managedObjectModel: NSManagedObjectModel?
items.desc: The managed object model of the document.

items.name: func configurePersistentStoreCoordinator(for: URL, ofType: String, modelConfiguration: String?, storeOptions: [String : Any]?)
items.desc: Configures the receiver’s persistent store coordinator with the appropriate stores for a given URL.

items.name: func persistentStoreType(forFileType: String) -> String
items.desc: Returns the type of persistent store associated with the specified file type.

items.name: func read(from: URL, ofType: String)
items.desc: Sets the contents of the receiver by reading from a file of a given type located by a given URL.

items.name: func revert(toContentsOf: URL, ofType: String)
items.desc: Overridden to clean up the managed object context and controllers during a revert.

items.name: func write(to: URL, ofType: String, for: NSDocument.SaveOperationType, originalContentsURL: URL?)
items.desc: Saves changes in the document’s managed object context and saves the document’s persistent store to a given URL.
